about_the_game:
Seal the Rift is a single player roguelike deckbuilder that offers endless replayability.
Each playthrough brings a unique combination of cards, relics, magic, enemies and events. Ensuring no two playthroughs are ever the same.

Features:

  • Choose from countless cards to shape your deck.
  • Acquire game changing relics.
  • Fight against unique and challenging enemies. If you are defeated, your run is over.
  • Explore a map that changes with each playthrough, balancing risk and reward as you choose your path.

Down on your luck?

  • Control your fate by utilizing "Boost". A powerful tool that lets you enhance the potency of one card in your hand.
  • Turn things around by casting magic. A precious and limited resource. Expand your arsenal of spells by defeating bosses.

Choose your adventurer

Choose from 2 adventurers, each with a thematic deck allowing for diverse playstyles.

Level up

Increase your level to unlock additional cards and relics.

Discover synergies

Discover powerful synergies between cards and relics.

Show your mastery

Unlock account titles based on your high score.

Dark fantasy setting

A rift has opened, unleashing terrible monsters and dark forces into the world. Those who ventured before you have met with failure. The forest has been corrupted, the castle has transformed into a living graveyard and there are whispers of a dragon sighting.

Now the world's fate is in your hands. Are you up for the challenge?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-650 | AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650, 1 GB | AMD Radeon HD HD 6950, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660, 2 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7970, 3 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Discover an endlessly replayable roguelike deckbuilder. Craft a unique deck, collect powerful relics, harness potent magic and enhance cards with "Boost" to overcome the challenges ahead as you set out to Seal the Rift!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese
